item.title: 美国就业数据强劲后的利率反思如何撼动市场
item.description: 如果强于预期的经济增长促使投资者彻底改变对美联储未来几个月需要削减多少借贷成本的看法，那么美国就业数据的爆炸性反响可能会威胁到以利率下降为前提的各种交易。【原文：The reverberations from a blowout U.S. employment number could threaten an assortment of trades predicated on falling interest rates, if stronger-than-expected growth spurs investors to radically shift views on how much the Federal Reserve will need to cut borrowing costs in the months ahead.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国 "不着陆 "情景提振市场
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 中国 9 月黄金储备连续第五个月保持不变
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，中国央行 9 月份连续第五个月没有购买黄金作为储备，主要原因是黄金价格飙升。【原文：China's central bank held back on buying gold for its reserves for a fifth straight month in September, official data showed on Monday, mainly due to a surge in prices for the yellow metal.】

item.title: 日本引领亚洲股市反弹，美元在美国非农就业数据公布后上涨
item.description: 周一，在井喷式的美国劳动力数据消除了市场对经济衰退的担忧并促使降息押注大幅减少之后，亚洲股市反弹，美元兑日元汇率创下七周来的新高。【原文：Asian stocks rallied and the dollar reached a fresh seven-week peak on the yen on Monday after blowout U.S. labour data dispelled fears of a recession and spurred a sharp paring of rate-cut bets.】

item.title: 在经历了一年多来最强劲的单周涨幅后，原油涨幅有所收窄
item.description: 由于中东地区爆发战争的威胁日益加剧，油价在上周五创下一年多来的最大单周涨幅后，周一早盘收敛涨幅。【原文：Oil prices pared gains in early trade on Monday after charting their biggest weekly rise in over a year on Friday amid mounting threats of a region-wide war in the Middle East.】

item.title: 日元下跌，日本最高外汇外交官警告防范投机行为
item.description: 日本最高货币外交官三村敦史（Atsushi Mimura）周一发出警告，在日元汇率跌破 1 美元兑 149 日元的时候，不要在外汇市场上进行投机活动。【原文：Japan's top currency diplomat, Atsushi Mimura, issued on Monday a warning against speculative moves on the foreign exchange market as the yen fell below 149 per dollar.】

item.title: 美国就业数据和中东局势爆发后，美元一路走高
item.description: 日元跌至近两个月来的最低点，其他主要货币也在周一早盘遭遇损失，因为美元延续了上周五强劲的美国就业数据和中东冲突升级所引发的涨势。【原文：Japan's yen fell to its lowest in nearly two months and other major currencies too were grappling with losses early on Monday as the dollar extended a rally sparked by Friday's strong U.S. jobs data and an escalation in the Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 以 10 亿美元入股辉瑞公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，激进投资者 Starboard Value 已持有辉瑞约 10 亿美元的股份，并希望这家美国制药巨头做出改变，扭转业绩。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value has taken a roughly $1 billion stake in Pfizer and wants the U.S. drug giant to make changes to turn its performance around, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 三星第三季度利润复苏乏力
item.description: 该公司在人工智能热潮中迟迟未能兑现承诺。【原文：The company has been slow to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: REC 调查显示，英国薪资增长为 2021 年 2 月以来最弱
item.description: 一项调查显示，9 月份英国就业市场出现更多降温迹象，薪资增长速度为近四年来最慢，这可能会让英国央行在考虑是否再次削减借贷成本时感到放心。【原文：Britain's jobs market showed more signs of cooling in September as pay growth increased at the slowest pace in almost four years, according to a survey likely to reassure the Bank of England as it considers whether to cut borrowing costs again.】

item.title: 欧洲央行可能在 10 月份降息，原因是通胀率过低：维勒鲁瓦
item.description: 法国中央银行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）对意大利一家报纸说，欧洲中央银行可能将于10月17日降息，因为经济增长疲软，这增加了通胀率低于2%目标的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably cut interest rates on Oct 17 as economic growth is weak and this raises the risk that inflation will undershoot its 2% target, French Central Bank Chief Francois Villeroy de Galhau told an Italian newspaper.】

item.description: 交易达成后，里约将成为电动汽车电池金属的第三大生产商。【原文：A deal would make Rio the third-largest producer of the electric-vehicle battery metal.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局批准 SpaceX 猎鹰 9 号飞行器于 10 月 7 日进行飞行
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周日表示，SpaceX公司的猎鹰9号运载火箭（Falcon 9 vehicle）已获准返航，执行计划于10月7日从佛罗里达州的一个发射站发射的任务。【原文：The SpaceX Falcon 9 vehicle is authorized to return to flight for a planned mission scheduled to launch on Oct. 7 from a station in Florida, the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Sunday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官：应允许中国汽车制造商通过在欧盟投资规避关税
item.description: 在德国及其汽车制造商拒绝对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税后，欧盟仍将继续对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税。【原文：The EU will press ahead with tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, even after Germany and its carmakers rejected them.】

item.title: 谷歌、Wayve 和布鲁克菲尔德将出席英国投资峰会
item.description: 英国政府周六表示，英国新政府的首次国际投资峰会将邀请来自谷歌、Wayve 和布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）等公司的高级管理人员参加。【原文：The new British government's first international investment summit will feature senior executives from companies including Google , Wayve and Brookfield Asset Management, the government said on Saturday.】

item.title: 意大利检察官指控 7 人和 2 家公司生产有缺陷的波音飞机零部件
item.description: 意大利检察官周六指控七人和两家分包商犯有欺诈和违反飞机安全规定等罪行，此前他们对一家意大利公司为波音公司生产的疑似缺陷部件进行了调查。【原文：Italian prosecutors on Saturday accused seven people and two sub-contractors of crimes including fraud and breaching airplane safety rules following an investigation into suspected flawed parts produced by an Italian company for Boeing .】

item.title: 欧盟计划对中国电动汽车征收关税不利于中欧关系和绿色目标 - 新华社
item.description: 新华社周六称，欧盟委员会决定继续对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税，这有可能破坏中国与欧盟数十年来的合作，并危及气候变化目标。【原文：The European Commission's decision to press ahead with tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles threatens to undermine decades of cooperation between China and the EU, and endangers climate-change goals, Xinhua news agency said on Saturday.】

item.title: 富士康第三季度营收同比增长 20
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商台湾富士康周六公布，其第三季度收入同比增长 20.2%。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, reported on Saturday that its third-quarter revenue jumped 20.2% year on year.】

item.title: 据共同社报道，沙特阿拉伯 PIF 考虑增持任天堂股份
item.description: 据 Kyodo News 周六报道，沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（PIF）正在考虑增持任天堂和其他日本游戏公司的股份。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) is considering raising its stakes in Nintendo and other Japanese gaming companies, Kyodo News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 国营媒体称中国采取刺激措施后房屋销售上升
item.description: 周六，中国国家媒体称，自 9 月下旬以来，中国采取了一系列房地产刺激措施来提振陷入困境的房地产市场，国庆假期期间中国的房屋销售量有所上升。【原文：China's home sales rose during the National Day holiday after a string of property stimulus measures to boost the country's beleaguered real estate market since late September, state media said on Saturday.】

item.title: 永利度假村称获得阿联酋首张博彩执照
item.description: 酒店和赌场运营商永利度假村（Wynn Resorts）周五表示，已获得阿拉伯联合酋长国商业博彩监管总局颁发的该国首张商业博彩运营商许可证。【原文：Hotel and casino operator Wynn Resorts said on Friday it had been awarded the first commercial gaming operator's license in the United Arab Emirates by the country's General Commercial Gaming Regulatory Authority.】

item.title: 香橼的安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）要求法官驳回美国证券交易委员会的欺诈案
item.description: 香橼资本公司（Citron Capital）创始人兼做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）要求法官驳回美国证券交易委员会对其提起的诉讼。【原文：Citron Capital founder and short seller Andrew Left has asked a judge to dismiss the lawsuit by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission that has accused him of making millions of dollars by misleading investors with his social media comments.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息后，美国红利 ETF 备受投资者关注
item.description: 自美联储上月启动降息周期以来，投资于派息股票的美国交易所交易基金（ETF）迎来了资金流入潮，不过美国国债收益率的飙升可能会减缓投资者资金的涌入。【原文：U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) that invest in dividend-paying stocks have enjoyed a rush of inflows since the Federal Reserve kicked off its rate cutting cycle last month, though a jump in U.S. Treasury yields could slow the deluge of investor funds.】

item.title: Rivian 申请联邦贷款重启佐治亚州电动汽车工厂建设
item.description: 根据能源部提交的文件，Rivian Automotive 已申请联邦贷款，以便在佐治亚州建造电动汽车工厂。【原文：Rivian Automotive has applied for a federal loan to enable the construction of its electric vehicle factory in Georgia, according to a filing by the Department of Energy.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业菲斯科面临美国证券监管机构的调查
item.description: 据美国证券交易委员会周五提交的一份文件显示，该委员会正在调查菲斯科，并已向这家破产的电动汽车制造商发出了多份传票。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Fisker and has sent multiple subpoenas to the bankrupt EV maker, according to a filing by the regulator on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称力拓正在洽谈收购锂矿商 Arcadium
item.description: 三位直接了解谈判情况的消息人士称，力拓一直在就收购锂矿商 Arcadium 进行谈判，这笔交易将使力拓成为电动汽车电池金属的第三大生产商。【原文：Rio Tinto has been holding talks to buy lithium miner Arcadium , three sources with direct knowledge of the negotiations said, a deal that would make Rio the third-largest producer of the electric vehicle battery metal.】

item.title: 诺和诺德将投资 1.58 亿美元在巴西建设胰岛素工厂
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司周五表示，将投资8.64亿雷亚尔（约合1.582亿美元）改造位于巴西的一家工厂，该工厂的胰岛素产量占其全球产量的四分之一。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk will invest 864 million reais ($158.2 million) to revamp a plant in Brazil responsible for pumping out a quarter of its insulin production globally, the firm said on Friday.】

item.title: BNSF 铁路公司批准与 SMART-MD 的 5 年协议
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的 BNSF 铁路公司表示，国际金属薄板、航空、铁路和运输工会铁路、机械和工程部门的成员已于周五投票批准了与公司达成的五年协议。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway-owned BNSF Railway said that the members of International Sheet Metal, Air, Rail and Transportation union's railroad, mechanical and engineering department have voted to ratify a five-year agreement with the company on Friday.】

item.title: 波音公司与罢工工会谈判代表将于 10 月 7 日重返谈判桌
item.description: 波音公司最大的工会周五表示，双方将于10月7日恢复谈判，以寻求达成一项协议，结束这家飞机制造商在美国西海岸工厂约33000名工人的罢工。【原文：Boeing's largest union said on Friday that talks will resume between the two sides on Oct. 7, as both seek an agreement that would put an end to a strike by around 33,000 of the planemaker's U.S. West Coast factory workers.】
